rooms.description: A spacious entry designed to welcome natural light with a Vastu-aligned entrance, ensuring auspicious energy flow.
An open-plan living area combining dining and lounge spaces. Large windows on the east side ensure abundant morning sunlight and cross ventilation, promoting a fresh environment.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and ample natural light from south-facing windows to enhance food preparation and cooking efficiency.
A modest but comfortable living space for domestic staff, ensuring privacy and convenience. Ventilation is maximized with strategically placed cross windows.
Well-ventilated bathroom area utilizing natural light and built-in exhaust systems to maintain hygiene and a refreshing atmosphere.

openings.description: Large, energy-efficient windows across living spaces and kitchen to optimize natural light and ventilation.
Strategically placed to promote cross airflow throughout the duplex studio apartment townhouse.
